title: Physical Education Design through Emotional Impact Analysis of Badminton Game Formats

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic badminton rules and foundational knowledge of physical activities
context.additional_context: Conducting critical incident technique (CIT) surveys using smartphones in resource-constrained technological environments.

learning_goals: Students can specifically identify positive/negative emotional triggers across five badminton game formats.
Students can form project teams to analyze CIT-based survey data and write comparative reports on emotional patterns.
Based on analysis results, students can propose physical education class improvements considering emotional response differences by gender/space conditions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
